title: (x) Freeware alternative to Serpentine?
content:
![FONT_SAMPLE](http://web.archive.org/web/20071214061929im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/51002.jpg)   
   
I am desperately trying to get a free font similar to this font - i have found a commercial font similar - called 'Serpentine', anyone who knows of a similar font?   
   
Thanks in advance

 [‹ 2 fonts from Investors Business Daily](http://web.archive.org/web/20071214061929/http:/www.typophile.com/node/7062 "Go to previous forum topic") [Are You an Artist? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071214061929/http:/www.typophile.com/node/7083 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: What are your plans for the font?
I need to recreate it as a vector image so i can use it in a brochure.

[Serpentine Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20071214061929/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.566.0.3&charSize=14&sampleText=MANAGEMENT&sampleSize=24) is $21. If you're designing the brochure for a   
client, perhaps you can add the cost of the font to your final bill.
Thank you for the link Stephen.
